title: Cosmos Hub votes to cut Atomâ€™s inflation rate from 14% to 10%
description: Cosmos Hub, a pivotal blockchain within the Cosmos network, has passed a proposal to decrease the inflation rate of its native token, Atom. This move, marking a significant shift in the ecosystem’s economic strategy, saw the maximum inflation rate drop from approximately 14% to 10%. As a result, the annualized staking yield for Atom is ... Read more
